id.description: A unique UUID assocaited with each event used for deduplication.

offset.description: This field is only used when directly consuming from the connect api to indicate the offset for resuming.  Connect integrations will always have this value set to 0.

occurred.description: The time the event occured as an iso8601 UTC timestamp.

processed.description: The time the event was processed as an iso8601 UTC timestamp.

push_id.description: Identifies the push that is fulfilled by the send. Every send event has a push_id which is not associated with a pipeline or plt.

group_id.description: If the push is associated with a PLT or a pipeline a group id will be present.  Sends of this push body will have the push id on the send event.

trimmed.description: Was the payload trimmed due to size

payload.description: A base64 encoding of the push payloads json.  Trimmed if the trimmed boolean is true
